data.name: The Last Look Demo
data.detailed_description:
Play the first moments of The Last Look


This demo includes the very first moments of Alice' journey towards her freedom. Solve challenging puzzles, dive into the atmospheric story and meet the mysterious enemy for the very first time.
The demo will give you a small glimpse of what will await you in the final game.

What will the full game offer?


  • Dynamic (not pre-scripted) AI: you can encounter the main antagonist anywhere at anytime
  • Hide and seek… or run: It’s your choice, but choose wisely
  • Dynamic health system: Play safe and Alice' health will give you more time, play risky and better to be faster
  • Atmospheric horror
  • Challenging, varied puzzles
  • A rich detailed world with various settings from indoor to outdoor
  • A twisted, sinister story that unfolds the deeper you get into the nightmare
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: The Last Look is about finding the exit in an old house while solving puzzles and hiding from a scary enemy. By solving challenging puzzles in an eerie setting, the player is to be offered an equally entertaining and exciting gaming experience.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual-core, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core, 3 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
